Articles.Content: What did you have to do to get the two planes locked? I would love to add this to the OPM/OPM+ K2 pack. Was is formulated or did you jsut tweak till it worked? Thanks for the RT fix.

Anyway I think that if you scale everything up properly it should maintain the lock. I'm not sure tho.

The RemoteTech expansion will need RemoteTech to be compatible with 1.0

Got your PM, and just wanted to let you know I downloaded the whole bundle ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Loving everything about it, especially the inclination of Pluron/Khato ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) The tilted Urlum is pretty sweet too ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I think I'll release another fix in a few days since I've noticed a couple of things I don't like, I'll invert the orbits of the moons to get them more similar to uranus' moons

I was waiting for the next opm patch to fix those problems but since it doesn't seem that close afterall I think I'll fix it now.

What I'd like to do afterwards is getting some custom clouds set up for the giants, Eleusis La Arwall has already made the majority of the work making all the configs for every cloud pack you can think of, and done an awesome job with urlum. And did everything without adding textures. If real life is kind enough I hope we can put together a clouds pack which has more variety. (I don't want to spoil to much ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif))
